description: Global Android Dev Camp will take place from 17th to 19th of Feb. They have a new logo and in the last few days more Locations were added.
title: Android Dev Camp
Brussel: Outpost Brussel, Rue de la Tribune 8, 1000 Brussel
Paris: EIT ICT Labs, 23 Avenue d Italie, 75013 Paris
San Francisco: Dev Bootcamp, 923 Market St., San Francisco, CA
Montreal: CRIM, 405 Avenue Ogilvy #101, Montreal, QC H3N 1M3

description: So check the map if your city is missing ;-)
